briefTitle: Phase 2 Study of Adjuvant Radiotherapy in Breast Cancer Using a Once a Week Hypofractionated Regimen
officialTitle: Weekly Hypofractionated Radiotherapy in Breast Cancer: a Phase 2 Clinical Trial
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Breast carcinoma
* Submitted to breast conserving surgery with pos-op free margins status
* Early stage: pT1-2N0

Exclusion Criteria:

* Positive pathological margins
* Submitted to chemotherapy, either neoadjuvant or adjuvant
* Previous breast reconstruction
* Bilateral breast cancer
* Previous thoracic irradiation
* Collagen disease
